DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare safety effect HPP404 versus placebo body weight overweight obese subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Efficacy Study HPP404 Weight Loss Overweight Obese Subjects
DOC.criteria: Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 30.0 39.9 kg/m2 , subject additional co morbidity ; BMI 27 39.9 kg/m2 , subject co morbidity ( i.e . dyslipidemia define high LDL ( ≥ 160 mg/dL ) high total cholesterol ( ≥ 240 mg/dL ) , subject hypertension ) Systolic blood pressure > 160 mmHg and/or diastolic pressure > 90 mmHg Screening Visit without treatment History use tobacco nicotinecontaining product 180 day prior Screening visit Subjects type 2 diabetes fast blood glucose concentration ≥ 126 mg/dL History appetite weight modifying surgeries/procedures
